description_comparison_selections.title: gorilla_carts_gor400com_steel_ga
description_comparison_selections.human_description:
Gorilla Carts GOR400-COM Steel Garden Cart, Steel Mesh Removable Sides, 3 cu ft, 400 lb Capacity, Green

CONVERTIBLE CART WITH QUICK ASSEMBLY: This garden wagon's durable steel mesh frame is easy to assemble, and the innovative removable side panels let you quickly convert the outdoor wagon into a flatbed cart for hauling bigger loads

EASY TO MANEUVER: The 10-inch pneumatic tires, tight-turn radius and smooth steering, ample ground clearance, and sturdy 4-wheel design let you tackle any terrain with stability and ease

400 POUND CAPACITY: Tow all your essentials with this heavy-duty garden cart's 400-pound capacity and 34" x 18" bed

STRAIGHT PULL HANDLE: The comfortable, straight pull handle makes hauling heavy loads for landscaping or gardening projects a breeze

YEARS OF QUALITY & INNOVATION: Gorilla Carts are designed for strength and performance to help get your projects done no matter the size, and have fun doing them; this yard cart has a 1-year warranty

The newly-designed Gorilla Carts Steel Garden Cart has been engineered to significantly reduce assembly times, making it quick and easy to put this cart to work. The new frame design of this yard wagon improves maneuverability, increases ground clearance, and gives the cart a tighter turn radius, making it easy to move up to 400 pounds for gardening, farming, or any other outdoor jobs. The outdoor utility wagon's durable steel bed features removable sides that allow the cart to convert into a flatbed for moving larger materials like 2x4s, tree branches, or fence posts. The 10-inch pneumatic turf tires are designed to tackle any terrain, and the padded grip handle has also been upgraded to make hauling heavy rocks, wood, or plants easy for anyone. Whether you’re an experienced farmer, a casual gardener or an occasional do-it-yourselfer, this utility cart will ensure that your outdoor projects go off without a hitch. The bed dimensions measure 34-inches by 18-inches, and the cart has an overall height of 37-inches and weighs 36.6-pounds. Gorilla Carts's full line of products meets the needs of the light-duty homeowner as well as the commercial-duty professional user by offering a wide variety of carts in many sizes and weight capacities. The Gorilla Carts GOR400 Steel Garden Cart comes with a 1-year limited warranty.
description_comparison_selections.llm_description:
Hello, we have good cart for garden work. This is Gorilla Carts GOR400-COM. It is strong because made of steel and can carry up to 400 lb. You can put many thing on cart, it has size of 34 inches long and 18 inches wide.

Frame of cart is steel mesh, very durable. You can take off side panels so it is easy to put big things on cart. Also, it can change to flatbed cart if you need. Cart has 4 wheels, they are big, 10-inch and filled with air for move easy on ground. Even if ground is not flat, cart can go because it has good space under it.

It is not hard to put together, it is quick. When you need to pull cart, it has straight handle, good for hands. Turning is not hard, it has tight turn radius so you can go around things in garden.

Cart is green color, nice for outside. It is not heavy, only 36.6 pounds and not tall, 37 inches high. When you buy, it comes with warranty for 1 year.

This Gorilla Cart is good for garden or any outside work where you need to move many things. It is strong and easy to use. Thank you for look at our product.

description_comparison_selections.title: kissair_compact_1500w750w_space_
description_comparison_selections.human_description:
KISSAIR Compact 1500W/750W Space Heater with Thermostat - ETL Certified Ceramic Portable Heater Fan, Ideal for Home/Dorm/Office/Kitchen, Black; indoor, electric, size: 7.72" x 6.38" x 9.13"; weight: 2.6 pounds, three modes: heating 750W, heating 1500W, air circulation; safety: automatically turns off at 45 degrees; delivers heating in 2 seconds, PTC (Positive Temperature Coefficient), noise below 45 dB

KISSAIR Compact 1500W/750W Space Heater with Thermostat

KISSAIR is an artistic home appliance brand dedicated to introducing innovative, superior performance and textured home appliances to meet the consumer needs of customers at home and abroad. KISSAIR offers high quality products and designs, and has global R&D, design, production and sales capabilities that have gained domestic and international consumer base and investors over the past 8 years.

Intuitive Control: Easily adjust the heat settings using the control knob on the right side. Choose "I" for gentle warmth at 750 watts, "II" for faster and hotter heat at 1500 watts, or switch to "Fan" for cool air circulation. Fine-tune the temperature by turning the thermostat knob on the left, ensuring optimal comfort with precision.

Enhanced Safety Feature: Experience peace of mind with built-in overheat protection and tip-over protection. The thermostat control automatically shuts off the heater when it reaches a preset temperature, reactivating once the temperature drops. Additionally, if the heater is accidentally overturned or tilted beyond 45 degrees, it instantly cuts off power, prioritizing the safety of you and your loved ones.

Compact yet Powerful: With dimensions of 7.72" x 6.38" x 9.13" and weighing only 2.6 pounds, this lightweight mini heater is incredibly portable. Don't let its size fool you, though. Powered by ceramic technology, it delivers quick heating within 2 seconds, warming up a 200-square-foot space in no time. By efficiently heating specific areas instead of the entire house, it helps you save on electricity bills. Whether in your bedroom, living room, study, or office, enjoy its convenient portability.

Advanced Ceramic Technolog: The Easy Control Heater employs a PTC (Positive Temperature Coefficient) heating element, which offers superior stability compared to traditional heating elements. Benefit from rapid heat generation, dependable performance, and optimum safety. Its low thermal resistance ensures swift heat exchange without any visible redness on the heater's surface, reducing the risk of burns, fire hazards, and other safety concerns. Consider it the ideal electric heating component available today.

Whisper-Quiet Operation: Operating at noise levels below 45 dB, this ceramic heater provides a tranquil environment. Its quiet operation allows you to use it in the bedroom while sleeping without disturbance. Enjoy a peaceful and comfortable ambiance, and relish in the cozy warmth it brings.
description_comparison_selections.llm_description:
Hello, we have a product for make warm in spaces like home, place for work, dorm, and kitchen. This product name is KISSAIR Compact Space Heater with Thermostat. It is black color and for use inside.

This heater has two power options for heat. When you need little warm, it use 750W, and when you need more warm, it use 1500W. Also, it can just move air with Fan mode without heat. This is good for not too cold time.

Heater is safe because it stop if get too hot inside or if fall down over 45 degrees angle. This is good for worry less about danger. It is not big, size is 7.72 inches wide, 6.38 inches deep, and 9.13 inches tall. Not heavy, just 2.6 pounds.

It has ETL certification, so is made with good standards. Heater use electricity and have PTC for make heat, which is good type for make warm fast in just 2 seconds. It is also quiet, make noise below 45 dB.

Thank you for look at our heater. If need warm in your place fast and safe, consider this KISSAIR heater for buy.

description_comparison_selections.title: julep_eyeshadow_101_crme_to_powd
description_comparison_selections.human_description:
Julep Eyeshadow 101 Crème to Powder Waterproof Eyeshadow Stick, Putty Matte

HIGHLY PIGMENTED EYESHADOW PUTTY MATTE: Go neutral with our matte eyeshadow stick in a light taupe-pink. With over 30 high-pigmented shades from Matte, Shimmer, and Metallic, you can build your own eyeshadow palette and go as understated or bold as the day (or night) calls for.

CREME-TO-POWDER WATERPROOF EYESHADOW: This waterproof, crème-to-powder eyeshadow stick glides effortlessly across lids before drying to a waterproof crease-proof powder finish.

NATURALLY EFFECTIVE INGREDIENTS VITAMIN C & E: This cream-to-powder eyeshadow stick does double-duty, thanks to the hydrating, nourishing formula with vitamin C & E. Delicate sensitive skin will love the vitamin E that protects against free radicals with antioxidants, and the vitamin C, which treats environmental damage to improve skin tone and texture. And candelilla wax makes every shade easy to blend, naturally.

NO BRUSH REQUIRED: Just glide and go. With smooth application, a built-in smudger for effortless blending, and a waterproof powder finish, you don’t need a brush to get the look you love.

HOW TO APPLY: Prime the smudger by coating it with color, then sweep the eyeshadow stick directly across your eyelids. Use the built-in smudger or your fingers to blend before the formula sets. For best results, prime the smudger by coating it with color prior to use.
description_comparison_selections.llm_description:
Hello, we bring to you our eyeshadow product for make your eyes look with beauty. This is called "Julep Eyeshadow 101 Crème to Powder Waterproof Eyeshadow Stick, Putty Matte." It is a good choice for the eyes because it has color like light taupe-pink, very nice and natural.

This eyeshadow is special because it have good color when you put on skin, called highly pigmented. It is matte type but you can also choose other types like shimmer and metallic if you like shiny. We make it by crème-to-powder formula, so it is soft to put on eye but then become like powder. It will not come off with water because it is waterproof and it will not make line on eye after time, this is called crease proof.

We put good things inside like Vitamin C and E, and Candelilla Wax. These are good for the skin. If your skin is sensitive, it is still ok to use. It can help your skin look better and protect from bad things like sun.

You do not need special tool to use this eyeshadow. It comes with smudger on the end, so you can make the color soft on eye. We tell you to put color with stick, then use smudger or fingers to make nice before it sets.

For the second product, it is same name "Julep Eyeshadow 101 Crème to Powder Waterproof Eyeshadow Stick, Putty Matte." But here, we tell you more details. We have 30 different colors you can choose. It makes skin feel good, give hydration and nourishment. It also help to fix skin from damage and make skin tone and texture better.

It has smudger too, and it is easy to mix the color on eye. You must blend the color before it becomes dry.

The last product is same too, but here we talk about the shade Putty Matte. You can have matte, shimmer, or metallic finish. It has good things for skin like vitamins and wax. You do not need brush to apply. It has built-in smudger for easy use.

We hope you like our eyeshadow and choose it for your beauty needs. Thank you.

description_comparison_selections.title: cordless_handheld_standard_range
description_comparison_selections.human_description:
Cordless Handheld Standard Range Area Imager Kit with Presentation Cradle and USB Kit, Black,
Compatible Devices: Laptop, Desktop, Power Source: Corded Electric, Usb Cable, 3 AAA batteries required.

* Compatible Devices: Laptop, Desktop
* Power Source: Corded Electric, Usb Cable
* Brand: ZEBRA
* Connectivity Technology: USB Cable
* Number of Batteries: 3 AAA batteries required.

AFFORDABLE 1D/2D SCANNER: An affordable 1D/2D imager that doesn’t compromise performance or features for price. Capture barcodes from mobile devices, 1D and 2D Paper barcodes on items for sale, coupons, loyalty cards and more.

GENERAL PURPOSE USE: The DS4308 scanner is hand held with an ergonomic, lightweight design. Built to be used reliability all day long while reducing employee fatigue allowing this scanner to be used in a wide variety of business situations.

BUILT FOR YOUR BUSINESS: This cordless imager is built primarily for retail and hospitality businesses everywhere, but the applications are endless. Placing this reliable tool at your point of sale will ensure quick transactions and keep the lines moving.

EASY TO USE: Point and shoot scanning with omni-directional scanning means users never need to line up the imager and the barcode. The aim line guides users to scan at the ideal distance from the barcode. This is helpful when capturing wide barcodes.

EASY TO DEPLOY: Pre-configured and ready to use right out of the box. Auto-host cables will identify your Point of Sale (POS) interface and connect the imager, simplifying and reducing set up time.
description_comparison_selections.llm_description:
Hello, we have product for sale, it is very good for your shop or hospitality business. Name of product is "Cordless Handheld Standard Range Area Imager Kit with Presentation Cradle and USB Kit, Black." This product is from ZEBRA brand.

This scanner is good for work with laptop and desktop. You can use with corded electric, or with USB cable, or with 3 AAA batteries. This is very good because you can choose how to power it. It is using USB cable for connect.

It come with 3 batteries. Batteries are type AAA. This scanner can read codes 1D and 2D. It is good for use in many places like retail and hospitality because it is made for general purpose.

Scanner is easy to hold in hand because design is ergonomic and not heavy. It can scan in all directions, which is very helpful. It is ready to use from beginning, and it knows how to connect to many things without you tell it.

Features are many. It scan in all ways, has line to help aim, and it already set up for use. Also, it comes with cables that know how to connect to host.

Thank you for looking at our product. It will be good for your business.

description_comparison_selections.title: cosori_food_dehydrator_for_jerky
description_comparison_selections.human_description:
COSORI Food Dehydrator for Jerky, Large Drying Space with 6.48ft², 600W Dehydrated Dryer, 6 Stainless Steel Trays, 48H Timer, 165°F Temperature Control, for Herbs, Meat, Fruit, and Yogurt, Silver

DESIGNED IN CALIFORNIA: Cook delicious and healthy treats in less time with a 600W rated power, a max temperature of 165°F / 73°C, and hot air circulation from the rear fan

FULLY EQUIPPED: Your food dehydrator comes with 6 stainless steel trays (12 x 13 in), 1 mesh screen, 1 fruit roll sheet, 1 user manual, and a 50-recipe cookbook. Search for C267-2MS, C267-FR, or C267-2ST to find more accessories

LARGE CAPACITY: Dehydrate enough snacks for the whole family with up to 6.5 ft² of drying space

PRECISE TEMP & TIME: Use the digital control panel to set the timer for up to 48 hours. Dry foods at the exact temperature you want between 95°–165°F, with accuracy down to the degree

PREMIUM MATERIAL TRAYS: Made with food-grade stainless steel, the trays are safer, more durable, and dishwasher-safe. Wash the trays on the top rack of your dishwasher and remove them before the drying cycle

QUIET TO USE: With noise levels less than 48dB, simply press the Start button to dehydrate your food and go to sleep

SAFE TO USE: Auto shutoff kicks in right when the timer ends. Overheat protection will activate if the dehydrator overheats. 120V, 600W. Please note that this voltage only applies to USA and Canada

GLASS DOOR: Use the glass door to check on your snacks throughout the entire dehydrating process

Key FeaturesTouch-Control LED DisplayTimer (30 min–48 hr)Adjustable Temperature (95°–165°F)Dishwasher Safe TraysAutomatic ShutoffMemory FunctionOverheat ProtectionExtends the Shelf Life of Your Favorite FoodsIncluded Recipe Book with 50 Original RecipesSpecifications and AccessoriesVoltage: AC 120V 60HzPower: 600W6 x Stainless Steel TraysTray Size: 12 x 13 in1 x Mesh ScreenMesh Screen Size: 10.7 x 11.8 in1 x Fruit Roll SheetFruit Roll Sheet Size: 11.3 x 12.8 in
description_comparison_selections.llm_description:
Hello and welcome to our product page. We have for you a very special item called the COSORI Food Dehydrator for Jerky. This machine is very good for making dry foods like jerky, fruits, and more.

Our dehydrator is made with design from California. It has power of 600 watts, which can heat up to 165°F (73°C). This hot air comes from a fan in the back, so it goes all around the food for good drying. There are 6 trays made of stainless steel. They are big, each one is 12 inches by 13 inches. With all trays, you have 6.48 square feet space for drying many things at once.

It has a timer you can set up to 48 hours and you can change temperature from 95° to 165°F. The control panel is digital and easy to use with touch control LED display. You can even remember your setting with memory function. Trays are safe to wash in dishwasher, and machine is not loud, less than 48dB.

For safety, it will turn off by itself and it has protection so it doesn't get too hot. You need 120 volts to use this, which is right for USA and Canada. It has a door that is made of glass, so you can see inside without opening.

We give you 50 recipes to try, and there are also extra things like 1 mesh screen and 1 fruit roll sheet with good sizes for more kinds of drying.

We hope you enjoy making healthy and tasty dried foods with our COSORI dehydrator. Thank you for considering our product.

description_comparison_selections.title: ucanbe_athena_face_body_paint_oi
description_comparison_selections.human_description:
UCANBE Athena Face Body Paint Oil Palette, Professional Flash Non Toxic Safe Tattoo Halloween FX Party Artist Fancy Makeup Painting Kit For Kids and Adult

A Face Body Paint palette refilled 20 creamy intensive pigmented colors in a convenient and sturdy plastic case that applies easily with sponge or brush. It can be used on the face and body.

Tattoo Face Body Paint is made of high quality ingredients to be easy blended, comfortable on the skin while being vibrant. It remain flexible to resist cracking while drying quickly to a smudge-proof and durable finish but minimal rub-off.

20 flash Aqua colors is suitable for creating many different looks. It included bossy gold and silver, pink,purple,red,yellow, blue,green,brown of all basic (plus extra black and white). It meet the needs of different occasions. The colors can be easily shaded together to obtain a wide variety of effects for artistic makeup or special effects coloring.

Non-toxic oil-based painting palette, the formula is moist, semi-soft, safe and gentle on skin. Richer color-saturated coverage than ordinary makeup, easy to wear and easy to wash off with olive oil or professional waterproof makeup remover.

Professional face paint for festivals, carnivals, birthday, campfire or theme parties, SFX makeup,stage performances, not to forget fun halloween and other occasions! Easily create crown, costume, bruise, blood, cosplay looks. Friendly materials are safe for both popular kid and adult.

description_comparison_selections.title: realspace_magellan_59w_managers_
description_comparison_selections.human_description:
Realspace® Magellan 59"W Manager's Computer Desk, Blonde Ash

Work comfortably on this Realspace Magellan manager's desk. The slide-out keyboard tray conveniently holds your computer's keyboard, while the file drawer keeps paperwork neatly tucked. Featuring a paper laminate finish, this desk resists scratches and endures water spills for lasting use. This 59-inch Realspace Magellan manager's desk features 3 box drawers for storage, and the medium-density fiberboard provides sturdy support.

Medium-density fiberboard material for sturdy support.

Slide-out keyboard tray.

4 drawers for neat storage of supplies.

Medium desk recommended for home or professional use.

Work comfortably on this Realspace Magellan manager's desk. The slide-out keyboard tray conveniently holds your computer's keyboard, while the file drawer keeps paperwork neatly tucked. Featuring a paper laminate finish, this desk resists scratches and endures water spills for lasting use. This 59-inch Realspace Magellan manager's desk features 3 box drawers for storage, and the medium-density fiberboard provides sturdy support. Medium-density fiberboard material for sturdy support. Slide-out keyboard tray. 4 drawers for neat storage of supplies. Medium desk recommended for home or professional use. Magellan desk with a blonde ash finish. Inner drawer color may vary. Assembly required. Tested to meet ANSI/BIFMA Performance Standards - Manufacturer testing has been conducted on this product to meet specific performance requirements and safety standards set forth by the American National Standards Institute (ANSI) and the Business and Institutional Furniture Manufacturers. This product is heavy and/or oversized and may need more than one person to handle. Interested in in-home assembly? Please call our certified and insured professional assemblers 866-388-4350 today!
description_comparison_selections.llm_description:
Hello Dear Customer,

We present to you the Realspace® Magellan 59"W Manager's Computer Desk in beautiful Blonde Ash color. This desk has been designed with careful attention to both functionality and style, perfect for your home or office space.

The desk measures a generous 59 inches in width, providing ample space for your computer, documents, and other essentials. It is constructed from sturdy Medium-density fiberboard, ensuring durability and longevity.

With a finish of paper laminate, the desk's surface is not only elegant in its Blonde Ash color but also practical. It is resistant to scratches and water spills, which means it can withstand the daily rigors of office work or home use.

This desk features a total of 4 drawers, providing plenty of storage options. It includes a convenient slide-out keyboard tray for ergonomic typing, 3 box drawers for your office supplies, and 1 file drawer for organizing important documents.

Please note that assembly is required for this desk, and due to its weight and size, it may be best to have more than one person available to handle it. The product meets ANSI/BIFMA Performance Standards, assuring you of its quality and safety.

For further assistance with assembly, you have the option to contact our assembly service at 866-388-4350.

We hope this desk serves you well, whether you're managing business from home or in a professional setting. Thank you for considering our product.

Best wishes,
[Your Company Name]

description_comparison_selections.title: dewalt_20v_max_cordless_drill_an
description_comparison_selections.human_description:
DEWALT 20V MAX Cordless Drill and Impact Driver, Power Tool Combo Kit with 2 Batteries and Charger, Yellow/Black (DCK240C2)

DCD771 in cordless drill combo kit features 2 speed transmission (0-450 / 0-1500 RPM)

DCD771 high performance motor of cordless tools combo kit delivers 300 unit watts out (UWO) of power ability completing a wide range of applications

DCD771 compact, lightweight design of the drill/ impact driver combo kit fits into tight areas

DCD771 1/2-inch single sleeve ratcheting chuck provides tight bit gripping strength

DCD771 Ergonomic handle delivers comfort and control

DCF885 Compact (5.55-inch front to back), lightweight (2.8 lbs) design fits into tight areas

DCF885 1-handed loading 1/4-inch hex chuck accepts 1-inch bit tips

DCF885 features 3 LED light ring withe 20 second delay to provide visibility without shadows


›  See more product details

This DEWALT 20V max Lithium Ion Drill Driver/Impact Driver Combo Kit comes with DEWALT cordless tools including the DCD771 20V max 1/2-inch Drill/Driver, and the DCF885 1/4-inch Impact Driver. Both have a compact and lightweight design to fit into tight areas, as well as an ergonomic handle for comfort and control. The DCK240C2 in DEWALT tool kit is ideal of completing a wide range of applications. LED foot light for superior visibility.
description_comparison_selections.llm_description:
Hello and good day to you. We are bringing for sale a powerful tool kit for work that needs strong tools. This is the DEWALT 20V MAX Cordless Drill and Impact Driver, Power Tool Combo Kit. The color is Yellow and Black, very nice to see, and the model number is DCK240C2.

Inside this kit, you get two tools. One is Drill/Driver, model DCD771, it has two speed settings for different works, 0 to 450 and 0 to 1500 RPM. This motor is good, it gives 300 unit watts out (UWO). It is not heavy and big, because it is compact and lightweight. The place to hold, the handle, is easy and comfortable. The chuck, where you put the drill bit, is 1/2-inch and it is a single sleeve ratcheting type.

The second tool is the Impact Driver, model DCF885. It is not long, only 5.55 inches, and it weighs 2.8 pounds. Easy to use with one hand when you put the bit in the chuck, which is 1/4-inch hex size. It can take 1-inch bit tips. It has a light ring with 3 LEDs and they stay on for 20 seconds after you stop pressing the trigger. This helps you see what you are doing without shadows.

Both tools come with 20V MAX batteries. You get two of these Lithium Ion batteries. They are strong to last long for your work. The kit also includes a charger so you can charge the batteries when they need more power.

There are more things that are good about these tools. They have an LED foot light for seeing better in dark places. These tools are good for many kinds of work, they are strong and reliable.

When you buy this kit, you get one DCD771 20V max 1/2-inch Drill/Driver, one DCF885 1/4-inch Impact Driver, two 20V Lithium Ion Batteries, and one Charger. All these come in the box for you.

We hope you like this tool kit and find it useful for your work. Thank you for looking at our product.

description_comparison_selections.title: prelit_artificial_christmas_wrea
description_comparison_selections.human_description:
Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Wreath Garland Set, 23.6inch Wreath and 8.8 Feet Garland with Pines Cones, Berry Clusters, Frosted Branches, 100 LED Warm Lights for Indoor Outdoor Christmas Decorations

🎅【Christmas Garland and Wreaths Set】You will receive a 23.6 inch diameter Christmas door wreath and an 8.8 feet long garland. Consists of snowflake pine needle branches, 2 types of pine cones, berry clusters and 100 LED warm lights! The outdoor wreath decoration is as charming and lifelike as the real thing, adding to the holiday and Christmas atmospheres.

🎅【Battery Operated Wreath with Timer】Equipped with 100 LED warm lights in total, the Christmas wreath with lights is powered by 3 AA batteries (batteries not included), press the on/off button once, the wreath will light up and activate the timer function, which will automatically turn on for 6 hours and off for 18 hours every 24 hours.

🎅【Easy To Use】The decorative branches are pre-assembled, no assembly required! Made of sturdy high quality materials and hypoallergenic fireproof pins, strong and durable. Saves you time and effort of buying flowers every week, no need to spend time managing them, never fade away.

🎅【Perfect Christmas Decorations】The winter wreath and garlands are suitable for indoor or outdoor decorations, hang the wreaths on the wall, door, fireplace, living room, bedroom, dining room, windows to add festive atmosphere to any area of the house. This hanging wreath decoration will bring holiday cheer for years to come.

🎅【After-Sales Service】If you open the package and find the branches messy, please don't be angry. Flatten them by hand and you will achieve the desired effect. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us. We offer 365 days warranty and 24 hours friendly customer service.
description_comparison_selections.llm_description:
Hello,

We have a beautiful product for your Christmas decoration. It is a "Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Wreath Garland Set". This set is very nice for making your home look festive.

The wreath is big with a size of 23.6 inches wide. The garland is long too, 8.8 feet. They have decorations like snowflake pine needle branches, two kinds of pine cones, berry clusters, and frosted branches. It looks very much like real and very pretty.

There are 100 LED lights that give warm light. These lights use 3 AA batteries. They are not in the box, you must buy them. The lights have a timer. They stay on for 6 hours and then off for 18 hours. It is automatic.

You do not need to put the set together. It comes ready to use. The materials are very good. They are strong and do not cause allergies. The pins do not catch fire.

You can use this set inside or outside. It will not fade or need water. You can hang it on the wall, door, by the fireplace, or in many rooms like living room, bedroom, or dining room. It is also good for windows.

We give you a warranty for 365 days. If you have a problem, we have customer service every hour, all day.

We hope you like this Christmas decoration. It is strong, looks nice, and is easy to use.

Thank you.
